## Installation

A great part of this seminar will be conducted in [Overleaf Environment](https://www.overleaf.com/). This will ensure that we are having the latest and updated packages. It is also beneficial for collaboration work. 

Please [create an account](https://www.overleaf.com/)

The facilitator **May** help you with local computer problems during the seminar.

But before then kindly do the following prior to the seminar:

- Download and install [MikTex](https://miktex.org/download) 

- Download and install [TexStudio Editor](https://www.texstudio.org/)

::: callout-important
Follow the steps and directions during installation. Install the basic package.
:::
